price: Ó humanos! Comei do que há na terra, sendo lícito e benigno; e não sigais os passos de Satã. Por certo, ele vos é inimigo declarado.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ كُلُواْ مِمَّا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗا وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu kulū mimmā fī al-arḍi ḥalālan ṭayyiban walā tattabiʿū khuṭuwāti al-shayṭāni innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
